title: On the Women & Co. Blog: What Does It Mean to Live Within Your Means?
summary: In a recent blog post, Women & Co.'s President & CEO, Linda Descano CFA®, talks about what it means to live within one's means and whether we should be living beneath them rather than within. How do you do it? One thing she recommends is to save at least 20% of your after-tax income. Read more on the Women and Co. blog.
